description: This is a human activity recognition dataset with measurements from both mmWave radar and camera sensor. Meanwhile, we set multiple people scenario to mimic more realistic scenes. The other dataset collected in non-LOS(line-of-sight) environment, you can visit https://zenodo.org/record/7096889#.YynBvuhBwQ8 to get it. The mmWave radar sensors used in our experiments are composed of TI IWR6843ISK-ODS, eradar ESRR(corner radar), eradar EMRR(front radar). We appreciate the support of the eradar company, that provides corner radars and front radars for us, you can visit  http://en.eradartech.com/ to get more information.
name: mmWave Radar and RGB-D Camera Sensor Data for Human Activity Recognition
